website_summaries.verdict: A simple indoor barometer that offers two helpful bonus weather measurements.
pros: Large analog barometer display with additional thermometer and hygrometer features
Can be mounted on an indoor wall
cons: The tail end of the barometer can make it challenging to read the other dials depending upon position

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded a couple other reviews. Have had for 3 days. Set it as explained. Went from sunny the first day to stormy right now and to read the barometer you must tap on the glass each time so the needle goes to the correct reading.
customer_reviews.author: bassman0351

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: I live at the beach. Hasn't rusted out which is a great thing. Relative humidity is a bust. Temperature is accurate. Barometric pressure is so-so. We have a NOAA weather station close by. If I calibrate it today, it will be in range tomorrow but usually off by a tenth or more. After a few days, I need to check the NOAA site and recalibrate. Using it to tell relative pressure from day to day is what it's good for but, at the price, it is a reasonable device. Would I buy another? Probably not. Would spend more next time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Valstar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This equipment gives accurate reading for temperature, but not for humidity or barometric pressure. It's good looking but useless for me, as I have a chronic pain condition and need to track whether the pressure is rising or falling. Don't waste your money, if you're looking for a barometer.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust!
customer_reviews.text: The adjusting screw on the back doesn't work! Can't adjust. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ascher

customer_reviews.title: Might as well by a painting of a barometer.
customer_reviews.text: This barometer flat out does not work. I’ve set it and carefully placed it on the wall and in 2 weeks with major swings in actual barometric pressure changes it never moved. I’ve tapped lightly on the wall next to it, no movement. I’ve lightly tapped it, still not working. I’ve recalibrated it several times and it does not move at all. Last time I set it the altimeter setting was 30.05 and today it is 29.74, but the stupid thing is still holding steady at 30.05. A broken clock is least correct twice a day. This thing is only correct the exact moment you calibrate and then never again. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good price for an adequate instrument.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item because of the price offered. Figured I’d give it a try, and was pleasantly surprised. It keeps very close to barometric pressure readings of local weather stations. Keep in mind that pressure gradients differ with distance and each particular weather station’s calibration. You DO have to tap it lightly with a pencil or other small object to get a current readout. The setting “dial hand” is fun to use if, for instance, there is a massive high or low pressure system overhead. Then you can observe where it was in relation to changing future pressures.
customer_reviews.author: Shoprat1407

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sad
customer_reviews.text: I know that this is not the most expensive barometer out there, but I wish I would have shopped around a little more. It has never came close to the local barometric pressure, even though I've adjusted it several times. I would pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Eschler

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and inexpensive Barometer
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to adjust to the local barometer reading, but it works great .. tap lightly on the glass gauge and it snaps to the current reading, letting you know if the baro is falling or rising .. has a thermometer and humidity gauge as well. Great little piece for a home wx station.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Lepien

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it works.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely crafted piece of equipment and looks nice too. The numbers are big enough to read in low light. The temperature is accurate. However, the barometer is slightly off and the humidity way off. For example right now the humidity is 96% while the device is claiming its only 55%.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking but it does work well
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking but it works. Started to send it back because I was so disappointed in the looks. Not a good deal at all. Ever time I look at it I think about sending it back. But it does work well
customer_reviews.author: henry smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice weather station.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice and small weather station. It’s all plastic but quality is pretty good. Accuracy is fine so far. Barometer moves! That’s great because I read that some people had troubles with the barometer. You only need to loose it with special key (included) and adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Littlelulu

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a science teacher at a project based charter in San Diego. She gives this the thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Is working as it should.
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift and has been up since 12/25 and working without an issue since that time. We have had a number of weather changes during these last few weeks and the barometer has shown the appropriate reading for each.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Even though I adjusted this according to the instructions, this does not work. It doesn't accurately read the barometric pressure. I would not recommend this item, save the money on this cheap product and buy something worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: looks and works greast on my sailboat
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice on the boat although I'm not sure about the accuracy of the smaller hygrometer gauge. The barometer seems to be very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect this to swing wildly like a thermometer. You'll need to learn how to read it. Works well for us to show oncoming storms, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Bibber

customer_reviews.title: Have to tap it
customer_reviews.text: The barometer doesn’t seem to move on it’s own. I have to tap it to see if there’s any change. Other than that it seems accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a day
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this product. It seemed to work for about a day, but then some of the needles stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great home barometer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent home barometer. Easy to set up and place on your wall. Fairly accurate at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works rather well for not a high end unit. The readings have been very accurate. Only downside is it is a little small and hard to read from a distance. Other than that I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Me like gauges. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and totally functional. Acurate yet clean in design. Gauges are well placed. Now I can glance up and see which way the weather is going.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The barometric pressure is spot on, and the temperature is also accurate. I like it! Easy to read and set up.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the gift. She finds it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Classy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Have it bedroom. Make sure to tap so needle moves to correct spot.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: This is analog devices and works w/o power - great buy for old-fashioned weather freaks!
customer_reviews.author: Kuba Tatarkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: Yea it's junk.. Have to tap on the glass to get the hand to move..
customer_reviews.author: Marty Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Adjusted settings and is very accurate. Still using every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I have watched this barometer for five days. The display hand must stick and will not increase or decrease on the scales. If it continues to malfunction I`ll throw it in the trash! Very disappointed. Not worth the cost, time or trouble.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to read the barometric pressure
customer_reviews.text: The barometer works fantastic there isn’t anything I just like about the barometer it works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: rich vandecar

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: The needle hasn’t moved since I received it and it is much smaller than it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Terry C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gauge but....
customer_reviews.text: wish it came with a stand so I could place it on my desk. The 5 inch dial is not easy to read when hanging on the wall. I have had this product for 3 days and the barometer needle has not moved since I set it at 30 so I don't know if it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Harry L Tiemersma

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity.
customer_reviews.text: This it the best buy of a life time, it's so helpful to know good or bad weather is headed my way. Love this Barometer.
customer_reviews.author: Shane P.

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I frequently check it against the National Weather Service on-line barometric pressure. The readings are always very close.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: So far this instrument is working well and we like it.
customer_reviews.text: We like the instrument and it is accurate but we would have liked it to be 1-2 inches wider so that it would be easy to read from anyplace in the room it is used. The ad did not provide the diameter.
customer_reviews.author: John Thackrah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Works well for our applications. Good value. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Candice Murray

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This barometer was broken when I received it. The mechanism must be too sensitive to survive mail handling.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Bell

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Tells u what u need to know
customer_reviews.author: bologna

customer_reviews.title: Handsome BARO
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Good looking unit Very accurate CON: Needs to be "tapped" Tail of BARO needle interferes with lower dial view
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barometer works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small but easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: All three instruments work as they're supposed to. All seem accurate enough for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mort910

customer_reviews.title: will it work above 3000 ft
customer_reviews.text: Tried 2 and both did not work. Tried the put in bag test both did not move needle. Sent both back . Will not try another from this company....
customer_reviews.author: Richard Newman

customer_reviews.title: Weather, especially barometric pressure and temperature, can seriously affect your health.
customer_reviews.text: . . . Works fine . . . love the fact that there are no electronics involved !!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry L Workman

customer_reviews.title: barometer reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for last few days and it seems like everything is normal. Pretty good device and easy to read the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: chong ahn

customer_reviews.title: There is no more quality to say.
customer_reviews.text: As described, very satisfied. . Thank you, seller. The store has already been collected
customer_reviews.author: Bill Idler

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of useless junk
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but does not work. I could not imagine getting a more useless item,
customer_reviews.author: RYAN I.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and it was exactly what they had in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: good. Could be larger, but it isn't.
customer_reviews.text: It's a barometer, so what would I use it for? Seems fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: JW 46

product_meta.title: AMTAST Dial Type Barometer Thermometer Hygrometer Weather Station Barometric Pressure Temperature Humidity Measurement Easy Reading Display (Imperial)
feature_bullets: This portable weather station is composed of a barometer, a thermometer and a hygrometer
Measures barometric pressure, temperature and humidity. With imperial system
Its superiorities include simplicity, reliability and easy reading
No special maintenance work is necessary during its long term use
This Dial type weather station is made of superior materials
